name: Moonglass mirror
description: This piece of elven glass is filled by the ancient power. The light is warped near you in a very strange manner, making your foes think that you are currently in the other position.
effect: Roll a dice each time your hero is hit by the Missile attack when not adjacent to any adversary. On the roll of 1, discard this card. On the roll of 5-6, you can redirect that hit to any model nearby (friend or foe).
